name: What They Left For Us
description:
What will you leave for your successors?

What They Left for Us is an experimental "simulation" of the inter-generational effects of environmental degradation. Players make choices that can positively or negatively impact the environment, and then can share their world code to let other people deal with their problems!

Made for Experimental Game Design 2021 at RPI.

Owen Hey - Lead Programmer

Jay Idema - Programmer

Nick Maglio - Programmer, Lead Designer, and Bubble Artist

Dillon Nagele - Programmer and Sound Design

Jack Palumbo - Writer and Programmer

Larissa Truesdell - Environmental and UI Artist

'Melody of Nature' music by Zakhar Valaha
